results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d>1} prime(A286622(d)-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: (PARI) A305794(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if(d>1, m *= prime(A286622(d)-1))); (m); }; \\ Needs also code from A286622.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 11 2018
